parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of ECS instance N. Valid values of N: 1 to 20.

parameters.name: ProtectedFromScaleIn
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable protection for an ECS instance to prevent the ECS instance from being stopped or removed from the scaling group during scale-in events. Valid values:

*   true: enables protection for the ECS instance.
*   false: disables protection for the ECS instance.

parameters.name: ScalingGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the scaling group.
